title: In game latency issues as of 15/7/2016
body:
Hello there!
As of the 15th of July i have been experiencing latency issues within ranked games as well as normals, i have tested my net on all occasions to see if the fault was with me however my net speed check was positive so i was pondering if there was a server issue that some of the players are experiencing or is it just me? 

I have connected to my Wi-Fi, Ethernet and Even my phone 4G to verify if the fault was on my end but on every single network i have been suffering with at least 200ms which occasionally rises to 7000 if not more.

Is there anybody out there suffering the same issue? if so did you find a fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like it might be a problem with your ISP, however let's first rule out anything on your end by having you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article, if nothing there helps could you please do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Hey there,

There's definitely some noticeable packet loss which is seemingly originating on your ISP's end, you'll probably have to contact them about this.

There also appears to be a high packet buffering rate on your connection, please check out [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7) for a list of common applications which may  increase the buffering rate.

Your systems clock appears to be slow, by 40 seconds. This may affect some applications functionality, I would recommend [syncing your clock.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#wq1)
